    function showCarousel()
    {
        var carouselItems = $("#carousel .item");
        for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
        {
            var selection = Math.floor(Math.random() * carouselItems.size());
            carouselItems[selection].style.display = 'block';
            carouselItems.splice(selection,1);
        }
    }
</script>

          <td id="centerpiece-article-box" valign="top">
            <div id="centerpiece-headline" onclick="javascript:window.location='http://fayobserver.com/articles/2013/08/27/1278919?sac=fo.local'">Goodyear contract allows company to offer buyouts </div>
            <div id="centerpiece-text">Under the newly ratified master labor agreement between Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co. and the United Steelworkers union, the company is allowed to offer an overall 840 buyouts at the six protected plants.</div>
            <div class="centerpiece-related">
              <div class="centerpiece-related-item">
                <div class="related-type">RELATED:</div>
                <div class="related-link"><div><a href="http://fayobserver.com/articles/2013/08/22/1277851">Goodyear Tire &amp; Rubber Company union workers ratify&nbsp;new four-year contract&nbsp;</a></div></div>
              </div>
              <div class="centerpiece-related-item">
                <div class="related-type"></div>
                <div class="related-link"></div>

<table cellspacing="0" style="width: 100%;" class="ZventsDayButtons">
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
                    (function() {
                      // EDIT HERE: partner calendar base URL, search URL template,
                      // number of days to display
                      var partner = 'http://events.fayobserver.com/';
                      var searchUrl = partner + 'search?swhat=&amp;swhen={day}&amp;st=event';
                      var nDays = 5;
                      
                      var dayNames = [
                        'Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday'
                      ];
                      var monthNames = [
                        'January', 'February', 'March', 'April', 'May', 'June',
                        'July', 'August', 'September', 'October', 'November', 'December'
                      ];
                      
                      var todayClass = ' ZventsDayButtonToday';
                      var today = new Date( (new Date).setHours( 0, 0, 0, 0 ) );
                      for( var i = 1;  i <= nDays;  ++i ) {
                        var year = today.getFullYear();
                        var month = monthNames[ today.getMonth() ];
                        var date = today.getDate();
                        var day = today.getDay();
                        var weekend = ( day == 0  ||  day == 6 );
                        var weekendClass = weekend ? ' ZventsDayButtonWeekend' : '';
                        var dayName = dayNames[ today.getDay() ];
                        var search = searchUrl.replace( /{day}/, i == 1 ? 'Today' : i == 2 ? 'Tomorrow' : dayName );
                        
                        button( date, dayName.slice(0,3), search,
                          dayName + ', ' + month + ' ' + date + ', ' + year );
                        
                        todayClass = '';
                        today.setDate( date + 1 );
                      }
                      
                      weekendClass = ' ZventsDayButtonAll';
                      button( 'All', 'Events', partner, 'any day' );
                      
                      function button( date, day, url, title, clas ) {
                        document.write( [
                          '<td>',
                            '<a href="', url, '" ',
                              'class="ZventsDayButton', todayClass, weekendClass, '" ',
                              'title="View events for ', title, '" ',
                            '>',
                            '<span class="ZventsDayButtonDate">',
                              '&nbsp;', date, '&nbsp;',
                            '</span>',
                            '<span class="ZventsDayButtonDay">',
                              day,
                            '</span>',
                            '</a>',
                          '</td>'
                        ].join('') );
                      }
                    })();
                  </script>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>
